SEARCH
Package domain

Class Pagination

java.lang.Object
domain.Pagination
public class Pagination extends Object
Class with the purpose to paginate a document with 80 characters per line and 25 lines per page.

Transform a String text to String[] paginatedText in which element represents a page.

    • paginateText

      private String[] paginateText(String text)
      Paginates the given text and .

      Time Complexity: O(n), where n is the length of text

      Parameters:
      text - - One line text.
      Returns:
      String[] with the parameter text paginated and each element of the array represents a page.

    • paginateDoc

      public void paginateDoc(String inputDocTxt, String exportDoc) throws RuntimeException, NotOneLineTextException
      Main function of the class: Paginates the given input Document.txt, that contains a one line text, creates or replace a document with name stored in exportDoc and writes the result on it.
      Parameters:
      inputDocTxt - - Input Document with one line text.
      exportDoc - - Export Document to write the pagination at.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException
      NotOneLineTextException
